itunes:title: Assisting 101. Everything you need to know!
title: Assisting 101. Everything you need to know!
description:
In this episode Jessi and Stew chat about their real life experiences being an assistant and hiring assistants. The hair industry is ever evolving and having a good assistant can be so helpful as your business grows. Let us know what you learned from this episode and don't forget to follow us on instagram to let us know your thoughts, we love hearing from you!

WATCH JESSI'S YOUTUBE CHANNEL:
https://www.youtube.com/jessigish

WATCH STEWS YOUTUBE CHANNEL:
https://www.youtube.com/c/StewStylez


FOLLOW US ON INSTAGRAM!

@jzstyles.co

Jessi: @jz.styles, @justjessiiii

Stew: @stew.stylez

FOLLOW STEWS ASSISTANTS!

Megan: @meganebmeyer.hair

Sara: @beauty.by.sarakate

Piper: @pipesmason
